comment: You trust science every day - when you fly in a plane, drive a car, buy food. Seems like a strange time to now deny science.
amr:
# ::snt You trust science every day - when you fly in a plane, drive a car, buy food. Seems like a strange time to now deny science.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (t / trust-02
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (s / science)
            :frequency (d / day
                  :mod (e / every))
            :time (a / and
                  :op1 (f / fly-01
                        :ARG1 y
                        :destination (p / plane))
                  :op2 (d2 / drive-01
                        :ARG0 y
                        :ARG1 (c / car))
                  :op3 (b / buy-01
                        :ARG0 y
                        :ARG1 (f2 / food))))
      :snt2 (s2 / seem-01
            :ARG1 (t2 / time
                  :mod (s3 / strange)
                  :time-of (d3 / deny-01
                        :ARG1 (s4 / science)
                        :time (n / now)))))
